short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help them understand you and convert your naughty language. Tell them how you feel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
https://jam.party/

this extension will convert bad words or genuine/honest posts and give you a secret word that will be a replacement for it. You can share that secret word and the person you are talking to can use the secret word to see what you truly wanted to say.

This will help not getting banned or censored.
